price: Orang-orang kafir berkata, "Mengapa tidak diturunkan kepadanya (Muhammad) tanda (mukjizat) dari Tuhan-nya?" Katakanlah, "Sesungguhnya Allah menyesatkan 773 siapa yang Dia kehendaki dan menunjuki orang-orang yang bertobat kepada-Nya",
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۚ قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهۡدِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ مَنۡ أَنَابَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlu alladhīna kafarū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi qul inna al-laha yuḍillu man yashāu wayahdī ilayhi man anāba
